profile.name: Ajinkya Bijwe
profile.title: Assistant Vice President - Technology
profile.description: Passionate and results-driven software developer with over 8 years of experience designing and implementing scalable applications. Specializing in frontend development with React and TypeScript, with strong knowledge of backend technologies as well. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and creating exceptional user experiences.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Lead developer for the company's main product, a SaaS platform used by over 50,000 users. Architected and implemented major frontend features using React, TypeScript and GraphQL. Improved site performance by 40% through code optimization and lazy loading strategies.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive web applications using React and Redux. Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces. Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
experience.description: Built websites and web applications for various clients. Worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery. Gained experience working in an agile team environment.

education.description: Specialized in Software Engineering and Human-Computer Interaction. Thesis on optimizing rendering performance in web applications.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors. Active member of the Computer Science Student Association.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, and payment processing.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather dashboard that provides real-time weather information and forecasts for any location.

awards.title: Innovation Award
awards.description: Received for developing an AI-powered feature that increased user engagement by 35%.

awards.title: Best Mobile App
awards.description: Won for creating a health tracking app that was downloaded by over 500,000 users.

awards.title: Hackathon Winner
awards.description: First place in a 48-hour hackathon for building a sustainable energy tracking application.
